Projects.title: Projects API
Projects.description: REST API written in Golang that serves my personal project(s) data through an endpoint. It is actively in development to expand its functionality.

Projects.title: Password Generator
Projects.description: Generates a single 32 character password using various sensors and a base-93 alphabet. Over 200 bits of security!

Projects.title: Personal Website
Projects.description: Version 4.0 of my personal website that serves as my professional portfolio. (the website you are currently viewing!)

Projects.title: Automated Email Sender
Projects.description: Google Apps Script that sends graded assignment scores to a list of student emails via Google Sheets.

Projects.title: Menorah
Projects.description: Features 9 LEDs that each represent a candle on a Hanukkah menorah. Includes features such as day progression, and candle-like LED flicker.

Projects.title: LaunchPad Music Library
Projects.description: Music library expressed through sound frequencies, a Piezo buzzer and microcontroller.

Projects.title: Refreshable Braille Display Library
Projects.description: SD Hacks 2018 Demo: Driver for an analog refreshable braille display using six servos and a microcontroller.

Projects.title: Cyclone
Projects.description: Popular reaction-time-based arcade game using an array of LEDs and microcontroller.

Projects.title: Motion-Activated Lights
Projects.description: Motion-activated lights using an ultrasonic sensor and microcontroller.

Projects.title: Password Sequence
Projects.description: Secure sign-in hardware using a unique combination of n characters; can be extended to include as many characters/inputs as necessary.

Projects.title: Binary Counter
Projects.description: An array of LEDs that count in binary.

Projects.title: Windows Music Library
Projects.description: Experimenting with Windows' Beep() functionality and extending it to produce music. Thoroughly documented.

Projects.title: CPU Scheduler
Projects.description: An attempt at understanding round robin CPU scheduling by designing and implementing a Process object.

Projects.title: League of Legends Analysis
Projects.description: Analysis of possible permutations of champion selection in the game, League of Legends.

Projects.title: Yelp Dataset Statistical Analysis
Projects.description: A data science capstone project using linear regression and machine learning to glean useful information on Yelp reviews.

Projects.title: Point of Sale Software
Projects.description: Point of Sale software that I used as a hook to start learning and understanding Python 2.X

Projects.title: Vector Calculator
Projects.description: Support various binary operators on two vectors such as vector addition, subtraction, dot product, and cross product.

Projects.title: Student Organization Website
Projects.description: Developed UC San Diego's Triton Gaming (gaming and animation club) website jointly with four other students for student interaction and recruitment.

Projects.title: Decimal to Binary Converter
Projects.description: Plug in a decimal number and convert it into a binary number.

Projects.title: Law of Cosines/Sines
Projects.description: Formula to solve the law of sines and the law of cosines.

Projects.title: Matrix Solver
Projects.description: Solves two 3x2 matrices through extension of the matrix.

Projects.title: Cubic Equation Solver
Projects.description: Plug in numbers for the cubic equation and have the steps translated into a LaTeX file, with the solution included.

Projects.title: Quadratic Equation Solver
Projects.description: Plug in numbers for the quadratic equation and have the steps translated into a LaTeX file, with the solution included.

Projects.title: Pascal's Triangle (Row, Term) Calculator
Projects.description: Recursively calculates any term of any row of Pascal's Triangle in factorial time.

Projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
Projects.description: The canonical tic-tac-toe program for the burgeoning programmer.

Projects.title: Line Editor
Projects.description: Simple line editor that has read, write, replace, save, and delete capabilities.

Projects.title: Restaurant Menu Design
Projects.description: Created a sole proprietorship to sell an original menu design to a local restaurant.

Projects.title: Business Cards
Projects.description: Business card design that can make 16 to 20 business cards per 8.5'' by 11'' sheet of paper. Just cut and laminate!

Projects.title: 16th & Oak
Projects.description: Original text adventure game similar to Zork in the 80's. Features five characters and several commands to interact with your environment.

Projects.title: Guitar Fret Notes
Projects.description: Displays all notes of each guitar string and fret.

Projects.title: Conway's Game of Life
Projects.description: Cellular automaton game made famous by John Horton Conway in 1970.

Projects.title: Piano Scales
Projects.description: Displays every major piano scale and their unique variations.
